job_description:
We help large organizations and fast-growing startups secure their systems, their users, and their data.

We seek a highly motivated and experienced Software Engineer to join us.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in programming, good English communication skills, and enjoy working in a fast-paced startup environment.

By joining us:

You will

Develop new services and contribute to existing services to enrich Ostorlab's scanning platform pipelines.
Work on advanced state-of-the-art static and dynamic security analysis engines
Implement compelling, usable UIs; contribute to their design;
Contribute to open-source projects
Improve performance and overcome scalability limits.
Build clean, performant, and secure APIs.
Help improve our engineering tooling and practices.
Requirements

Experience working as a Developer.
You have experience in an object-oriented programming language (Python, C++, Java Javascript, etc)
A foundational understanding of data structures, algorithms, and systems
High level of autonomy, can work with a team, and enjoy continuous knowledge and learning from others.
Bonus points

You have experience contributing to an open-source project.

Career Benefits

Very competitive compensation package.
Competitive Salary
Comprehensive health and dental insurance
Strong professional development to keep you growing.
Friendly atmosphere and culture.
A chance to make an impact
